Html: The discussion name pretty much says it all, this was promised to be released well over 6 months ago now.

Don't know if you've already seen Scott Gu's blog here:
http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2009/10/26/wpf-4-vs-2010-and-net-4-0-series.aspx
Back in Oct 2009 - it was going to be released separately and shortly after VS2010. I don't know if that is still true.  I sure hope that it is.
